basics.name: Nick Izawa
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2018.

skills.name: Toolsets/OS
keywords: Macintosh (Mac OS X, OS X, macOS)

work.company: Curriculum Research & Development Group, College of Education
work.summary: CRDG is an organized research unit in the College of Education at the University of Hawai‘i Mānoa. Currently working on a research project funded by the National Science Foundation that is aimed at broadening the Native Hawaiian Engineering faculty at UHM. Also helped with Hawaii GenCyber 2016 and created course resources for teacher education.
highlights: Collected and analyzed survey data, transcribed interviews, analyzed transcriptions, graphic design, and general clerical work
Created web-assets for the American Education Research Association (AERA)

work.summary: LAVA (Laboratory for Advanced Visualization/Applications) is a lab run by Jason Leigh, a professor and researcher at the University of Hawai‘i at Manoa. Using cutting-edge technologies like the CyberCANOE, the HTC Vive, the Microsoft Hololens, and more, the lab aims to create developments in big data visualization techniques. During my time there, I contributed to a variety of projects using Javascript skills, video making/editing skills, and transcription skills.
highlights: Created high-quality video tutorials for SAGE2
Contributed to development of SIEGE, a simple video game for the CreaTable
Transcribed lengthy clips for the Articulate project

work.company: University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa American Studies Department
work.summary: Provided clerical assistance for the American Studies Department at the University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa.
highlights: Clerical duties (campus mail run, scanning/printing/faxing, lifting)
Managed student database (processed major applications, mail list)
Provided IT assistance for department faculty

work.summary: KTM Services Inc. is the distributor for Enjoy Snacks, a very popular local brand in Hawai‘i.
highlights: Packaged and sealed boxes of snacks in factory
Pulled and packaged orders of varying snacks from warehouse
